articles.author: Josh Pennington
articles.title: As critical deadline for Niger’s military coup expires, the country’s airspace closes due to ‘threat of intervention’ - CNN
articles.description: Niger’s airspace closed on Sunday, the day imposed as a deadline by a group of African countries for Nigerien military coup leaders to release power and reinstate the country’s democratically-elected president.
